Social Features in Kindle

Role

research, design, user testing

Tools

Axure, Sketch, Omnigraffle, paper iPad app

A team project piece about introducing a social aspect to the Kindle app to increase user engagement. Hand in hand with users, we learned from them, designed and tested a design that allows discussing books with friends yet without taking away the focus and peace they enjoy while reading a book on the app.

  • Case Study
  • Artefacts
  • Prototype
  • Documentation

Book chat open while reading a book
